entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
